mapper.select: SELECT -- 'test_4401' as rtalPhacCodg , -- '对外测试机构(药店接口)' as rtalPhacName, a.BillCode as buymedDocCodg, a.PaidInAmt as selAmt, --CONVERT(varchar,a.Dates,101) as buymedDate, a.Dates as buymedDate, 'test_4401A' as authPhacCodg, -- newid() as tranIdSn, d.staffname as crterName, --c.MedCareCode as medinsListCodg, '202012088001' as medinsListCodg, b.RetailP as rtalPric, b.num as selCnt, b.PaidInAmt as selAmtd , e.BatchCode as manuLotnum FROM dbo.TRBILLMT AS a WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TRGOODSDT AS b WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.BillNo = b.BillNo INNER JOIN dbo.GOODSDOC AS c WITH(NOLOCK) ON b.GoodsId = c.GoodsId INNER JOIN dbo.STAFFDOC AS d WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.caozy = d.STAFFID INNER JOIN dbo.BATCHCODE AS e WITH(NOLOCK) ON b.AngleId = e.AngleId AND b.GoodsId = e.GoodsId join (select max(billno) as id from TRBILLMT WITH(NOLOCK) where caozy=#{caozy} and PaidInAmt=#{paidinamt} and orgid=#{orgid}) x on x.id=a.billno
